::DarkMouse::
She stopped walking and stood there for a second.
"You saved my life? Why? You don't even know me?"
She looked down at the ground.
"I thank you sacrificing yourself like that for me.  I don't remember if I 
was in the forest or not.  I know I was reprogrammed.  I don't really 
remember anything before the reprogramming. I have a few images, feeling, 
about some things and that's it.  Scorpanoc erased practically everything 
from my memory banks."

She looked at him and smiled slightly at him.
"I want to thank you again for risking your life for me."
She leaned over and kissed him on the cheek.
She just then realized what she did. Her optics grew very wide and she had 
an awestruck look on her face plates.
"Uh, I'm sorry commander.  I don't know what came over me.  I won't let it 
happen again."  Her face plates turned a deep shade of red. She turned and 
quickly walked down the hall to where Megatron was.

----------Original Mesage----------
>From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>

>Subject: Neo Beast Wars

Quickstrike:


"Ah sav'd yer life," Quickstrike said to Dark Mouse. "That's why ya owe me. 
And ah coulda died fer it. Goin' against Transulas ain't th' best idea. Ah'm 
bettin' ah's gotta owe him twice! Ah don't know what he want'd wit' ya, but 
maybe ah was stupid t' even try! Ah got slagg'd twice tryin' to save ya, 
once when Transulas had ya strapped down, and th' second time when ya were 
outside. Now, ah gotta ask you uh question, have ah heard ya b'fore? Ah 
reckon ah may have 'cause me and boss-bot's group was on th' run and ah 
swear ah coulda heard ya and smelt ya in this forest."
